title: 瓶中船，但是基金会大电影先行预告
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:much-cool]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:text-style]]
[!--https://unsplash.dogedoge.com/photos/fJ1URp-_2Jo--]
[!--https://unsplash.dogedoge.com/photos/dMXT0PHTmMQ--]
[!--https://unsplash.dogedoge.com/photos/hkN2Zde2ga4--]
[!--https://unsplash.dogedoge.com/photos/ePG0jQBbRTk--]
[!--https://unsplash.dogedoge.com/photos/0Hgi8HxWysk--]
[!--https://unsplash.dogedoge.com/photos/-lLWCvEoFJM--]
[[div class="text-container-wrap"]]
+++ Waner Sist（摇钱树329号）
[[div class="text-container"]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]我老早就跟你说过我有这么一个计划。现在到了真的把它搞出来的地步了。[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]呃，你是不是发错人了？[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]没有，找的就是你。[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]负责电影这块他们说你最在行。[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]哦，我看到你发我的东西了。[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]项目计划书2023-6027对吧？ _
等等，是个电影企划？[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]是啊。[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]话说你真知道我是谁吗？[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]不知道，我觉得这不是重点。[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]但你可能知道我！上一次电影项目企划的方案也是我提的。[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]什么？上一份？[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]哦我操，哦我真他妈……操了，那个太空翼龙上了基金会特工的R18烂片是你丫拍的？[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]不是，玩意儿他妈的哪里艺术了？[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]你别管，好多人喜欢那个，能赚钱就行！艺术又不是普罗大众！[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]就说这次这个，跟你说，我排了一个预告文案，还有制作团队等等等等的，这艺术是真的屌飞了！[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]你连成品都没有，就给自己下了这个傲慢的评价了？[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]不，我是说，字面意思！[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]哈？[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]算了，话不多说，你看完预告文案就知道了，还有超牛逼海报！[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
----
[[=]]
+ 海报
[[/=]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/poster2.png]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/poster1.png height="420px"]]
[[f>image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/Poster3.png height="420px"]]

+ 先行预告
[[/=]]

[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/2.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/sub3.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/sub4.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/title3.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/3.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/sub5.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/title4.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/4.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/5.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/sub6.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/title5.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/8.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/6.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/title6.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/7.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/sub7.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/title8.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/sub8.png]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/logo.jpeg]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/sub9.jpeg]]
----
[[div class="text-container-wrap"]]
+++ Waner Sist（摇钱树329号）
[[div class="text-container"]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]呃……[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]怎么样？是不是超级屌！[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]某种意义上来说，确实。[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]顺便问一句，你不会把和我的聊天记录也放到花絮里去吧？[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]哈，谁知道呢！[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]所以成品进度到哪里了？[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]稍等，我来看一下。[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]新建文件夹了。[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]我可去你妈的吧！你那上面写着七月份上映！[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]你要相信我能行的。等找到好的演员就可以拍起来了！[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="recv"]]
[[span class="text"]]你甚至还他妈没人选？[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="sent"]]
[[span class="text"]]那有啥的，大不了跳票嘛。短空之王不就是那么干的吗？你也要相信我们剧组的粉丝基础！[[/span]]
[[span class="text"]]总而言之，我肯定会把这个拍出来！[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[=image http://scp-wiki-coloredbucket.wikidot.com/local--files/man-in-the-bottle/last.png]]
author: Kanie Ja
